data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Viana do Castelo, Portugal be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Viana do Castelo, Portugal
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Over 7.21 percent of the people of Viana do Castelo are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Viana do Castelo, Portugal that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Viana do Castelo, Portugal.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people might believe through him.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Viana do Castelo, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: There are 252,000 people living in the state of Viana do Castelo. Only about 8,868 might be believers.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 252,000 people living in Viana do Castelo.
